channel.title: Shop Items
channel.description:
hey i need to know howto put items in my shop please.
AND waht do all these represtent. Please help! THANKS IN ADVANCE [code]//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount[/code]

item.title: Shop Items
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

Shop ID :: The ID Of The Shop (1, 2 , 3 ect, used for the WanneShop I believe)
Shop Name :: Does This Need Explanation? Name The Shop.
Sell :: Can this shop sell items? 1 means sell any item to it, 2 means you can only sell back what the store sells.
Buy :: Honestly, I forget. I believe same as above.
Item :: ID of item you want in store.
Amount :: Amount of the Item ID before it.

Sorry, I did this quick, I may have missed something.

Read full topic
